english.segment1: When I wake in the morning. I want to blow into pieces. I want more than just okay, more than just okay
english.segment2: When I'm up with the sunshine. I want more than just a good time. I want more than just okay, more than just okay
english.segment3: I'm not givin' up, givin' up now. I'm not givin' up, not backing down
english.segment4: More than fine, more than bent on getting by. More than fine, more than just okay
english.segment5: When I'm lit with sunrise. I want more than just the blue skies. I want more than just okay, more than okay
english.segment6: More than oceans away from the dawn. More than oceans away from who we are. More than oceans, more than oceans, More than fine
